messages.title: WE HAVE A CLEAR CHOICE
messages.content: The Conservatives want to force through a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom.

messages.title: THIS ELECTION IS YOUR CHANCE TO STOP BREXIT

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.

issues.brexitEurope: The Conservatives want to force through a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom. A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.

images.caption: A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.
